summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 are fully implemented. A new Withdrawal page was created at frontend/src/pages/Withdrawal.tsx with four amount buttons (₹100, ₹200, ₹500, ₹1000), single-selection highlighting, and the dark navy/gold theme. The route is registered in App.tsx, and a 'Withdraw' button on the Account page navigates to it. No hallucinated features were detected.
